itps.desc: Welcome! Congratulations on taking your first step. Let’s embrace the Olympic spirit and take on this challenge together!
itps.desc2:
You’ve earned your first star!

Are you ready to level up step by step, just like in Milano Cortina 2026?

> Claim Your Celebration Reward
itps.desc3: It’s a bit disappointing, but that’s okay! Start again and aim for your first star. Your efforts are never in vain!

itps.desc: Two stars down! Like the icy yet thrilling winter sports of the Olympics, keep cool and determined to push forward!
itps.desc2:
Amazing!

Like a figure skater’s graceful performance, you’ve earned your second star. 

Keep it up—we’re excited for your next challenge!
itps.desc3: You missed the second star, but your unwavering passion embodies the true Olympic spirit. You’ll succeed next time!

itps.desc: Three stars! You’re halfway there. Keep pushing forward like an Olympic champion, and don’t forget to check out on your special reward!
itps.desc2:
Your steps reflect the determination of an Olympic Champion Marathoner. Claim your special reward now!

> Claim Your Special Reward
itps.desc3: Your journey towards the stars has paused. But don’t give up! Olympic heroes grew stronger because they never stopped moving forward.

itps.desc: You’re almost there! Take another bold step forward, inspired by the passion of Milano Cortina 2026. You’re creating an incredible journey.
itps.desc2:
Success is yours!

Just one more star to go, and an even greater reward awaits you. You’ve got this!
itps.desc3: It’s disappointing, but that’s okay! Like dedicated Olympic athletes, you’ll come back stronger in your next challenge.

itps.desc:
Shall we keep moving forward?
Dream of the silver slopes of Milano Cortina 2026 as you complete your ultimate challenge!
itps.desc2:
An incredible achievement!

Now, enjoy your shining moment, just like a hero at Milano Cortina 2026.

> Claim Your Special Reward
itps.desc3: It’s a bittersweet ending, but making it this far is already incredible. Keep dreaming big as you look ahead to Milano Cortina 2026!

descr:
Just one year to go until Milano Cortina 2026 ! 

Achieve your goals, unlock hidden special rewards, and and be part of an exclusive journey!

2025.02.13 - 2025.03.15
title: Join the Journey Today!
